EmailTemplate.name: WC-2018-06-Request-a-Demo-Cloud-Native.Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Requesting a Turbonomic Demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for requesting a demo with Turbonomic. Your request is being processed and a Turbonomic representative will be reaching out to schedule a time to meet.
We look forward to learning more about the challenges you are facing and discussing how we can help you deliver self-managing container platforms. If you have any questions in the meantime please reach out to asena.woodward@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:asena.woodward@turbonomic.com]]> or check out our latest content on container platform optimization here <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/container-platforms.]]>.
Sincerely,
Team Turbonomic
